g.text: because HostNetworkLink is a basic class
Gets list of host network interfaces
Gets host network interface by its name
Create host vlan interface with name rol.{Master}.{VlanID}
Deletes interface on host by its name
Sets new ip address for network interface
Save current host network configuration to the config file
Save previous config file to .back file
Restore host network configuration from .back file
Load host network configuration from config file
